website_summaries.verdict: If you don't like the thought of fiddling with buckles, try these slim-profile bands with hook-and-loop closures.
pros: Made from slightly elastic, high-tensile webbing
Stays tight while providing comfort and full range of motion
cons: Bands are somewhat stiff and can pinch your skin, so consider wearing over a shirt

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: These bands would be great it they fit; they were just too big for a woman. Otherwise a nice band; I had to return them since I could not make them small enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey Reina

customer_reviews.title: Best looking and easily adjustable occlusion bands.
customer_reviews.text: Straps are easy to adjust and tighten compared to just Velcro straps. Great design and a little fashionable too compared to plain straps. After you practice getting them in place, it won't take long to adjust. They run a tad small, but if they don't fit customer service is AWESOME and will replace. I'm very happy with my purchase and service. Consider these when looking for occlusion bands
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Quality occlusion bands
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these bands. Been using them more than a week now and they really perform well. It has just the right amount of padding to still be comfortable when cinched tight but also not to be too bulky. It also looks good but is thin enough that it can be easily worn stealthily under a t-shirt if that suits you. They are of high quality durable construction and look like they will last a long time. All in all, if you're looking for bands for occlusion training you won't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ockham

customer_reviews.title: They really work and are safe.
customer_reviews.text: I hurt myself as I began to lift more weight. I bought gloves to protect my hands and a belt to protect my back. Then I messed up my wrist. I saw an article about this method of working out and bought the bands. I followed the instructions and saw immediate results. I found it very easy to properly adjust the bands. I am getting stronger every week instead of every 6 months. The muscles are firmer too. You even get stronger muscles that are in proximity to the muscle you are working out. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: L Falkin

customer_reviews.title: Insane pump
customer_reviews.text: Great, the pump is insane. Just remember not to adjust the band too tight to avoid restrict the flow blood of your arteries. A little tight is enough for restrict the flow blood of your veins, and that's all you need to produce the pump, more tight not produce neither more pump nor more hypertrophy, instead could bring some problems in the future. So be smart and all is going to be benefits
customer_reviews.author: Another customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: These bands are rigid, don’t give whatsoever. Having an elastic band that has give in it is more desirable and more comfortable, even though you are tightening to be effective. The Velcro on these bands is so strong, I had to work hard to release them, which after a workout is very annoying. I purchased BFR bands for legs since they’re wider and they’re much more practical. With these, you’re basically paying for a strong piece of Velcro with a cheap buckle. At that price, wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jb4u

customer_reviews.title: Insane pump!
customer_reviews.text: My one rep max is around 55Lbs. With these I use 14-19 Lbs dumbbells and usually do between 15-40 reps depending on the exercise and my arms usually get about a 1 inch pump which is a lot considering I'm not that big (just under 15 inch biceps). My arms are much more vascular and since I'm using lighter weights for half of my workouts my elbow tendonitis has gone away.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly. I've used them almost every day since they arrived. I wrapped a thin strip of white duck tape all the way around each of them as a marker so I get the same amount of restriction each time. NOTE: these have WAY too much velcro - I could barely undo it the first time I used them so I covered all but the last half inch with duck tape. That made it all work.
customer_reviews.author: Senor Smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Pump
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something challenging that helps sculpt and grow. I did some research and tried this super pump and it worked as described. First of I train I am a amateur lifter with a big focus on form rather than just push the weight. My 1st day trying this it felt as I have never trained arms or if you remember your first day that type of soreness. Overall happy and will update.
customer_reviews.author: EliSma

customer_reviews.title: Intense pump and more reps!
customer_reviews.text: I like to tie these around my sleeves for more comfort, it allows me to tie it tighter without pinching my skin. I feel a big difference in my lifts wearing these, I definitely believe it restricts the lactic acid, and helps me pump out more reps. Definitely feel an intense pump.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Henry

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The bands are sturdy and easy to put on, although a layer of t-shirt helps to prevent pinching skin in the loop. I'm not convinced about the effectiveness of the restriction technique but that's certainly not the fault of the bands. I'll be able to find other uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Better than most bands.
customer_reviews.text: Good bands, could be better. Velcro is a bit annoying as it scratches your arm, if the band was slightly larger and had a neoprene layer it would be a lot more comfortable. Secondly I would like to see a numbering for tightness making it easier to know what your setting is. Other than those 2 issue I think the product holds up and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Database82

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical - sounded like bro-science. Used them and amazing pump as expected but also muscle soreness that I think will lead to hypertrophy. Just starting to use them so I can't plot any changes but I believe this is a good way to mix it up and is ideal for bad joints because you can lift lighter and get a good workout. Feels weird stressing on the light weights though. Product quality is good as expected. I just don't like the "Super Pump" printed on the yellow - kind dorky
customer_reviews.author: TAMc

customer_reviews.title: IMO these are the best straps on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought these and not the other ones was the strap system, and for the simple fact that these wont take up half your bicep lol You actually wanna see the pump.. these fit perfect between the top of your bicep and shoulder, really giving you a nice pump.
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ruptured Bicep Tendon Recovery
customer_reviews.text: After suffering a bicep tendon rupture this product was recommended by both my chiropractor and my friendly local gym owner for the assisting in reovery. Rather than bore you with the science behind why I can tell you I'm extremely happy with this product as it is clearly well made for durability and comfort. It's comfortable and very easy to apply with just one hand (trust me this is important -- and it's not possible with all straps).
customer_reviews.author: Todd Trulli

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses, the Velcro on one of the bands started to get all fuzzy and from then on it did not work very well. The design all together is not that great and not that I was looking for comfort with these bands but they were very uncomfortable to have on. I have since moved to another BFR band and only comment on the design and comfort based off of experience with another product designed for the same use.
customer_reviews.author: code99kid

customer_reviews.title: If you are into BFR training or want to start, these are a great choice
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The science behind BFR is legit, and the straps are high quality. I have been using them 1x/week for around a month and am very happy with the pump these give. It's nice to use a lower weight with BFR and get the same results as lifting heavy. These are easy to adjust, and fit well. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: vault86

customer_reviews.title: Superpump is worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I have used these straps for couple of days. I can feel the difference while doing arms excercise.It does what it is supposed to do. These straps will give you the same pressure at biceps with less weight. I hope the velcro stays good for a long time since we are loosing it between each sets and hence using it more frequently. Note : While using these straps make sure that you loose the strap between each sets to give your muscles some breathing space. Also wear this on top of cloth. I tried it on bare biceps and it was causing some difficulties during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Want to love
customer_reviews.text: Want to love these ... very good overall, but the velcro starts to fray after a short period... if you're heavy user.. prolly go with a more expensive product.. otherwise, prolly fits the average lifter's use.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Easy to use. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: They're doing a great job. It's easy to take on and off. By lifting weights and using them, you can definitely fill the difference You feel a much better swollen feeling while lifting weights and using the bands These seem to be very long-lasting and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Akshay

customer_reviews.title: Design needs work
customer_reviews.text: Product kept slipping and losing pressure as seen in the picture. The whole point of this product is to reduce circulation and this has a difficult time achieving that goal. Maybe if they weren’t secured to an elastic end giving it the ability to move around like that and essentially having the strap collapse on itself. Very frustrating to deal with. Will ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The bands are not long enough to wrap around my upper thigh and stay secure. I can barely get in on but the Velcro will not hold it long. I was looking forward to get these and now am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McAnnally

customer_reviews.title: Initial Impressions
customer_reviews.text: Preliminary review, since I'm fairly new to BFR training. So far, I'm reasonably impressed. The straps are sturdy, and I've no doubt they'll handle regular use. I've not had the problems others have had with undoing the velcro; in fact my only difficulty with them comes from how heavy duty they are: if you're the least bit clumsy, the stiffness (that will probably go away with more use) makes it a small challenge to get them initially secured. I've not been using these straps long, so I've not had enough time to see any results yet, but I'm certainly not worried about the design or durability of these straps. I'll update the review once I've been using them longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rhynes

customer_reviews.title: New and improved straps are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I recently reviewed these and found the only thing wrong with them was the velcro section was very, very tough to take off your arm. I recently got the newer updated version and they are a big improvement! They have a small tab now where it makes taking them off a breeze...definitely recommended for BFR training!
customer_reviews.author: Renesis79

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: They work great so far. Just be sure to do the research on how your suppose to use them you don’t want to injure yourself. There are A ton of YouTube videos on how to properly use them.
customer_reviews.author: kenny215

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. He has used other bands with more complicated buckles, and simpler ones that are really just rubber tourniquets. He says these are just right. They are simple to put on and easy to adjust in terms of tightness. The velcro is good quality and holds well. There is no metal clamp to pinch or bind into the skin. These can be used on bare arms or over t-shirt sleeves. Also easy to release. The pump obtained with BFR is great.
customer_reviews.author: grams

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: After working out regularly for years, this is my first time using bands. I’ve tried and returned a couple from other brands. These bands are simple and effective. I definitely feel a difference with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby H.

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on bands, mixed reviews on the actual benefits. But what I can say is that it gives a better pump. Perhaps any arm band would do the same but these look good and all the placebo tell me it’s working
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez Crew

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!!
customer_reviews.text: For someone with slightly larger arms these may be too small. My arms are larger than most average males but I'm by no means Arnold Swartsanegar. They fit me fine and WOW what a pump I got!! I'm truly amazed I hadn't heard of this technique before. I'll be getting some larger ones for my leg workouts. This should help alleviate some of the stress on my joints since I don't have to lift nearly the same amount of weight to get the same pump.
customer_reviews.author: charles g nichols

customer_reviews.title: ... learned about these straps from a fellow gym rat like myself, and i asked her what are they ...
customer_reviews.text: i first learned about these straps from a fellow gym rat like myself, and i asked her what are they used for and she told me "to give her an awesome pump in a short time" i was intrigued, so i bought some from this company, and I'm so glad i did. The greatest pump at a shorter duration, especially when I'm in a hurry for a quick workout, it gets the job done and i feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Fit girl

customer_reviews.title: These are the BFR / Occlusion bands/straps your looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've have found these to be the best option when using the occlusion method during bicep workouts. I have used the more elastic fabric bands others are selling for BFR previously but I wasn't happy with not being able to specifically tension the bands like I can with these. They are well made with quality materials and are durable. I personally use them at the end of a workout. You'll see results when used properly. Educate yourself on the proper technique and amount of occulsion necessary. The seller is responsive and stands behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: JeremyD

customer_reviews.title: Fighting Back Against The Aging Process With These
customer_reviews.text: I'm 59 and trying to keep up with a 16 year-old son who's a three-sport athlete. Blood flow restriction is becoming a bigger part of my workout arsenal. I have tried other bands before and these Superpump bands are the ones I'm going with from now on. They're easy to put on and adjust and they don't get in the way. I use them for bodyweight and barbell workouts and after about 10 sessions, I've noticed a positive difference in strength and muscle tone.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Hageman

customer_reviews.title: The bands are easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The bands are easy to adjust. I bought the larger set to use on both arms and legs. The bands gave an extra pump when using I used them while doing more of a controlled lift and holding weight for 2-5 seconds. This is where I could feel the difference. I suggest starting at a lighter weight than you would normally use in order to adjust to the bands.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Martinez

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to use and give a great pump to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and give a great pump to the arms if used right! Never have them so tight that your arms turn purple. slightly red is ok but you only want to cut off the veins not the arteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Averett

customer_reviews.title: The metal loop was terribly uncomfortable to the point that using these actually hurt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bands as I was doing some BFR (Blood Flow Restriction) training. Prior to using them I was wrapping my biceps with ACE elastic bandages. Once these came in I noticed that one size does not fit all. They were a bit too wide for me. The metal loop was terribly uncomfortable to the point that using these actually hurt. I immediately went back to the ACE wraps and gave these away. I do NOT recommend these, if you are BFR training, consider an alternate product.
customer_reviews.author: Gino C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great awesome pump! Just like trying out anything new you need to adjust the strap pressure to get it tight enough for "The Pump" but not to tight where it cuts off your circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and don’t come with a buckle that bothered me when I tried on someone else’s bands with a buckle. I had seen and heard about similar devices for years but didn’t really think they would benefit me until reading a post on Instagram. I felt the difference after only a few reps and can definitely tell a difference after using them a few times. I’ve gotten many random compliments on my biceps since using them. So apparently the benefits are very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: WALT MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Go with this brand
customer_reviews.text: I like the straps. I do not feel pain from the use of the straps. You have to be honest with yourself and know that these change the use of your muscles and if you do a good regimen it does hurt a good amount in your muscles, but that is the point. I would recommend this particular brand for sure. I just wish that example workout routines came with the straps. I am new to this type of exercise, but very interested in the ability to lessen wear on my body by using lower weights.
customer_reviews.author: Potts31

customer_reviews.title: High quality bands
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality BFR bands. They do well to restrict blood flow while remaining comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod S.

customer_reviews.title: Superpump delivers on quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this training program......but my experience has been very good. The use of light weights is a plus for me, as I have an issue with an elbow injury. The straps themselves are very well made and I am sure that I will be using them for years to come. Definitely impressed with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro wont last long.
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick and you feel a really good pump with low weight. But I don't see them lasting that long, after only 3 uses the Velcro part is already becoming very frizzy. I only train arms twice a week, so I give it about a solid month or two until there is no more velcro to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Incredible pump and gains!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible and nifty product. Helps make the pump quite intense. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Did the intended job and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Velcro is really sturdy, know how to use before you buy
customer_reviews.author: hljmedina1

customer_reviews.title: A Pull Tab on the End Would Help
customer_reviews.text: I've used the arm bands several times now for bicepnand tricep exercises. The pump, even with light weight or no weight is incredible. The band width is sufficiently wide enough to restrict venous bloodflow without pinching. The Velcro holds really well; too well sometimes. With arms engorged, it can be challenging to get a hold of the end and pry them loose. I recommend a non-Velcro tab be added on the end so you have something to pull up on to release the bands. A great product, but bring a buddy to help remove them.
customer_reviews.author: M S Turner

customer_reviews.title: Effective elegance
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity and effectiveness. It's pretty hard to go wrong with these Bands. They go on easy, fit well, and are priced right. The craftsmanship is obvious, as they are sturdy and hold their place well on the arms. Velcro holds the Bands securely. The pump on the arms is pretty immediate and impressive. Plus, the Bands look good!
customer_reviews.author: Legit

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Good price.  Great company service
customer_reviews.text: The first straps I purchased were too small to go around my (not exactly massive) arms and they were uncomfortable. I contacted the company and they responded right away with assurances that they were "going to make it right." I was shocked. The made some design changes and sent me a new pair. These straps are much, much better. I found that if you heat a knife and melt about 1/2" of the Velcro at the tip of the yellow strap, it gives you something to grab onto to loosen the strap. Maybe this will be the next design change. Good product. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jordan

customer_reviews.title: to small
customer_reviews.text: Should of read messuments ! Don't fit if you have big biceps
customer_reviews.author: Fire Chaplain

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can’t lift heavy weights !!
customer_reviews.text: These bands will give you a great pump for your arms with light weight. Right now I am dealing with a case of tennis elbow and this bands let me keep working out my arms without flaring up my elbow tendonnitis.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Great BFR arm straps.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quality is immediately evident. The tightening system makes it effortless to get just the right level of constriction. They definately work as advertised giving my arms a monster pump. They look good to boot not to mention a great price and lightning fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: roger youlden

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pump! My only criticism is that you need to put on a shirt underneath or it will pinch your skin and leave it red. Definitely a good finisher to add in from time to time. Joe Defranco has a podcast where he talks about occlusion training. Benefits and what not to do etc. Worth a listen.
customer_reviews.author: Noahb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for occlusion training. Use very light weights and proper form while using this. Update: Got a complimentary pair for legs for my prompt feedback and I started implementing blood flow occlusion training into my workouts for both my arms and legs twice a week. Awesome straps !!
customer_reviews.author: Fidelis Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great bands -- velcro is superhuman
customer_reviews.text: These bands are good for getting that extra pump on the arms when training. I agree with another reviewer that the velcro is almost impossible to detach when on your arms, at least for the first few times. I had to slide them down my arm to get them off. The recommendation to wear the bands on top of clothing is probably a good one as I didn't do that, and they left small bruises from pinching. For those who have larger arms, the bands need to be longer. I would have also preferred them to be smaller in width. Overall, a good product, just a few kinks that would have given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if your arms are over 17”
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they had good reviews and price point was good, however they are WAY too small for my arms and the Velcro and loop design pinch badly! Awful product!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Chalambaga

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a great product. I have my exercise science degree and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product. I have my exercise science degree and learned about BFR training in school. The studies show it really does help in muscle hypertrophy. The way the straps are designed makes them easy to adjust and the material is comfortable/durable. They also have a lip on the velcro for fast removal. In my opinion, for the price these are the best bands on the market. I will be buying another pair when and if this ever wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get some!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service of this seller is unmatched on amazon in my long tenure...these straps work GREAT for occlusion/kaatsu style training of muscles! Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I've been lifting heavy for years and haven't felt muscle fatigue like this in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I've been reading up on BFR training and thought I would give it a go. I ordered the deluxe set of bands and have been using them to supplement my arm and leg routines. All I can say is wow. The pump you get from these are incredible. I've been lifting heavy for years and haven't felt muscle fatigue like this in a long time. I haven't tried any other bands, so have nothing to compare it to, but for me they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the arm straps and wear a very lightweight long sleeve shirt underneath just to make sure the fit is comfortable and
customer_reviews.text: What a value! I read countless reviews and articles on BFR training and options for straps. I decided on these training straps and have no regrets. Everything from putting them on to tightening/adjusting the fit is greatly simplified with the Velcro and metal loop. I purchased the arm straps and wear a very lightweight long sleeve shirt underneath just to make sure the fit is comfortable and have had zero issues. You'll appreciate the ease at which these can be taken off after completely frying your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Bryse

customer_reviews.title: Mind blowing pump!
customer_reviews.text: Followed a BFR workout and loved the results! The pump is incredible using 1/3 of my normal weight. My arms felt like they were ready to explode. Looking forward to further explorations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: the bands do not stay straight in the buckle, they slide to 1side side and bunch up
customer_reviews.author: horse

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the results
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with pump. So far I like the results. Can't wait to see how well they work after several months of using. These are easy to get and adjust. Appear to be well made. Definitely recommend superpump.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Band for Blood Flow Restriction Training!
customer_reviews.text: This training band set works very well, is priced very fairly and will provide you with great results. It's amazing the difference you experience training with these. Reducing outgoing blood flow from the veins in your muscles combined with using a lower training weight brings your training to the next level. I've been weight training for the past 3 years and chose blood flow restriction training to get me over my plateau and to the next level. Give them a try, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jayco

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable. I've noticed that some users have complained of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very effective. It's very comfortable. I've noticed that some users have complained of it pinching. I had that at first, but I realized that I had it wrapped too tightly. On a scale of 1-10, use it at about a 7. I've noticed some difference already in muscle size.
customer_reviews.author: James DeSalvo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Tried for the first time today. Product is well made with strong Velcro. Worth the price. Arrived on time. It would be nice with future versions to place a marking system or ruler type increments so you could be sure to get the tension the same on both arms and reproduce the next time you use them. Felt like I was just guessing today.
customer_reviews.author: J R McClung

customer_reviews.title: Already impressed after one workout!
customer_reviews.text: Took a few minutes to put on and tighten. There is the possibility that these will pinch your skin and chaff you if you dont wear a shirt with sleeves. I wish they were elastic rather than velcro, but other than those points, I am already impressed with how my arms feel and look. Didnt take much to smoke my arms with these bad boys. They save time and joint pain as it takes less weight to get your pump
customer_reviews.author: A.M

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I gave these a try!
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing BFR training at physical therapy for strengthening my quad muscle that has a lot of atrophy from a broken femur last year. I like the results I was seeing at PT so I wanted to start doing more at home. Received these leg bands the other day and I can already tell they're better then the one I use at PT. The Velcro is nice for adjusting and stays tight without slipping. I was worried about the Velcro ruining my clothes but it doesn't. Really happy with this purchase! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not So Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks Stitching frayed Buckle rotates making strap less effective
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Soley

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A PUMP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Amazing what the pair of straps can do. I got the best pump ever. I didn't even have to lift the weight I usually lift and I still got the nice soreness you usually get after a great workout. I could also see my veins pumped. Great vascularity. Strongly recommend this product especially if it's been a while since you felt a good soreness. Worth it all the way.
customer_reviews.author: AJimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these straps for my boyfriend to use when lifting. He has a herniated disc in his cervical spine, and as a result has nerve damage that leaves him unable to lift the amount of weight he used to. So far these are helping a ton, and don't cut into his arms. I'd definitely reccomend them for someone who wants a pump without using super heavy weights!
customer_reviews.author: jordyn akers

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for an Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bad boys since I've received them, and all I can say is.. WOW. I used to use knee wraps but wrapping them was such a hassle as well as a little bulky. Trying to put these bands on at first can be a little bit of a struggle but once you get the hang of it they're an awesome accessory for your training session. Thanks Kettlebud tactical fitness for saving me some time by eliminating the knee wraps for my BFR training!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Agustin

customer_reviews.title: The bands are uncomfortable and don't get tight enough
customer_reviews.text: These bands are incredibly stiff. You definitely need to wear clothing underneath or they'll be extremely uncomfortable. They are also difficult to get sufficiently taut. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ten Bitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good , but be careful not to get skin caught in
customer_reviews.author: Rick Whittington

customer_reviews.title: ... Kaatsu training straps in the marked and I'm very happy that I chose the ones from Kettlebud Tactical Fitness
customer_reviews.text: I've been carefully reviewing all Kaatsu training straps in the marked and I'm very happy that I chose the ones from Kettlebud Tactical Fitness. They are comfortable, easy to put on, adjust and take off, durable and of good quality. The best one in the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Yomtov Salazar

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great training tool to add to my arsenal
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great training tool to add to my arsenal, my pumps have been outstanding. It has greatly enhanced my routines and develop new tactics.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE!  BAD! BAD!
customer_reviews.text: Metal strap digs into arm so don't buy if you plan to wear tank tops! They are stiff and scratchy. They also don't have enough stretch to them so once tight they are incredibly uncomfortable when actually lifting. BAD BAD! I'll go back to my cheap medical quick release tourniquet straps!
customer_reviews.author: Dana R. Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: I'm confused as to why these got such a high ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm confused as to why these got such a high review. I got these for my boyfriend, and because they're not elastic, they do not allow the muscle to freely flex under the strap. They are extremely uncomfortable, even when it's affixed on the arm at the top of the bicep.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Velcro fasteners on these work better than other brands fastening systems
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for BFR and are easy to use and adjust. No dangling straps as on other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for different bands, I settled with this one. I am very happy so far with these bands and it's very easy to use. It gives you the burn you need for BFR training... I highly recommend these bands...
customer_reviews.author: Mahesh

customer_reviews.title: I almost died using this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible, I almost passsed out because of using this product . I wanted to disattach one of the bands but it was stuck and not letting me disattach it from the first use.
customer_reviews.author: maryo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these bands. I find they give a great pump and they are comfortable to wear. I put in a lot of research into which bands to use and these are easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: not the most comfortable bands I've worn because of the metal loop and ...
customer_reviews.text: not the most comfortable bands I've worn because of the metal loop and the velcro chafing your skin but they serve their prupose
customer_reviews.author: Memphis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth money. Too small and uncomfortable. UPDATE: So Kettlebud Sent me a new set that is double backed and longer to fit my arms. IU have not worked out in them yet but I can already tell they will work beautifully and fit so much better. These will be better than the quick release models I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insane Pumps!
customer_reviews.text: Using these my arms have never been bigger. Better than any pump product, able to get insane pumps with light weight. Recommend some sort of sleeve to ensure skin doesn’t pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin McCorkle

customer_reviews.title: These are the straps you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of incorrect information about BFR on the Web so google kaatsu and read from the original source. These straps will work for correct BFR training and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Sias

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but there are better products out there
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad cuff. I really like the clothing mechanism. However the material and and lack of any elasticity make these cuffs hard to use. If the manufacturer would improve the material, I'd buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Rosnegarten

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had for like 6 weeks, Velcro starting to fray, also the plastic clip sometimes slips, but for the cost they work quite well
customer_reviews.author: charles compton

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I am hitting a fatigue point a little sooner ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been using the straps and I have been doing more high volume training and I am really feeling the pump. I feel like I am hitting a fatigue point a little sooner but because I am feeling more of a muscle contraction. So far this product has done what I was hoping and I am excited to see my progress over the next month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: the bands work ....but they are a bit wide. Alsothe velcro could have a bigger/longer tab for releasing the band. I got better constriction with thinner band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to improve my forearms. Quick shipping and excellent construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mao Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Concept works well. Strap design is simple which helps. Happy with product. Wish Strap width would have been 1/2" smaller. Feel that they're a bit to wide.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: if it were full elastic it would of been way better.
customer_reviews.text: I the nylon on the edge bothers me when you pump iron ...if it were full elastic it would of been way better.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality straps
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality straps. They are easy to get on and get tight.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pump, use these on burn outs and has really helped a lot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: They are very easy to put on and to adjust as necessary
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and appear to be well made. They are very easy to put on and to adjust as necessary. Definitely a good idea to wear over a shirt or gauze tape since can be a little uncomfortable on bare skin. They work as advertised though, I would recommend them if you want to try BFR training.
customer_reviews.author: BRF in training

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price or quality!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PUMP!! These straps are top notch quality. The larger strap is what I ordered so it can be used for both legs and arms. The quality is outstanding and I get a massive pump whole using them . I would definitely suggest these over other similar products available. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product... Have already noticed difference in appearance of vascular.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Bands not so great metal clips kept pinching my arms had to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Bands not so great metal clips kept pinching my arms had to take them off after 30 mins will be returning them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next Level pump
customer_reviews.text: These straps are the real deal. This is the first time I've ever written a product review, and that is because this training is that effective. I've already been able to use these several times in the gym and am seeing the progress which is being made. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This bands are amazing... The material is very strong and the price is reasonable. I receive very fast my bands and this week I start to use it.... The isolation move Feels good. My only advice for the seller is to put more and better information about how to use it. I recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Vazzu

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great pumps. Easy to put on and take off. Been using for months and still good
customer_reviews.author: Ed Roge

customer_reviews.title: I could not get a super tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I found the bands as advertised, but I would say that most will find the listed product more suitable for legs than arms...product is extremely durable, I could not get a super tight fit, perhaps for arms one needs a smaller band.
customer_reviews.author: Trader19

product_meta.title: SUPERPUMP BFR BANDS | Simple + Effective Quick-Release Straps for Bloodflow Restriction Training and Kaatsu Style Workouts | Arms
feature_bullets: 1.5" Medium Width Straps Provide Optimum Bloodflow Restriction for the Ultimate Kaatsu-Style Blood Flow Restriction Upper Body Workouts
Military Grade Hook and Loop Closure with Just Enough Elasticity to Stay Tight while Providing Comfort and a Full Range Of Motion
Slim Profile, Quick On-Off Straps Will Not Loosen or Disrupt your Workout with Dangling Material or Buckles
Simply the Easiest to Use, Most Effective BFR Bands on the Market. "Get your Swole On with SUPERPUMP!"
Arms Fit Circumference Approx. Up to 20"
